author: Simon Difford
description: A classic Gin Martini made aniseed fresh with a splash of absinthe. Like me, you may prefer the bite-sized version of this cocktail served straight-up in a Nick & Nora glass with half measures: 75ml (1.25oz) dry gin,  15ml (.5oz) dry vermouth, and 2.5ml (half spoon) absinthe.
name: Absinthe Martini

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
